description:
11.261 tpad
Temporarily pad video frames.

The filter accepts the following options:

color.description: Specify the color of the padded area. Check the 'Color' section in the ffmpeg-utils manual for the syntax.

start.description: Specify number of delay frames before input video stream.

start_duration.description: Specify the duration of the start delay. See the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax.

start_mode.description: Set kind of frames added to beginning of stream. Can be either 'add' or 'clone'.

stop.description: Specify number of padding frames after input video stream. Set to -1 to pad indefinitely.

stop_duration.description: Specify the duration of the stop delay. See the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax.

stop_mode.description: Set kind of frames added to end of stream. Can be either 'add' or 'clone'.

name: tpad

parameters.description: Specify number of delay frames before input video stream. Default is 0.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Specify number of padding frames after input video stream. Set to -1 to pad indefinitely. Default is 0.
parameters.name: stop

parameters.description: Set kind of frames added to beginning of stream. Can be either add or clone. With add frames of solid-color are added. With clone frames are clones of first frame. Default is add.
parameters.name: start_mode

parameters.description: Set kind of frames added to end of stream. Can be either add or clone. With add frames of solid-color are added. With clone frames are clones of last frame. Default is add.
parameters.name: stop_mode

parameters.description: Specify the duration of the start/stop delay. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax. These options override start and stop. Default is 0.
parameters.name: start_duration, stop_duration

parameters.description:
Specify the color of the padded area. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Color" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual.

The default value of color is "black".
parameters.name: color

source:
11.261 tpad

Temporarily pad video frames.

The filter accepts the following options:

start

Specify number of delay frames before input video stream. Default is 0.

stop

Specify number of padding frames after input video stream. Set to -1 to pad indefinitely. Default is 0.

start_mode

Set kind of frames added to beginning of stream. Can be either add or clone. With add frames of solid-color are added. With clone frames are clones of first frame. Default is add.

stop_mode

Set kind of frames added to end of stream. Can be either add or clone. With add frames of solid-color are added. With clone frames are clones of last frame. Default is add.

start_duration, stop_duration

Specify the duration of the start/stop delay. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax. These options override start and stop. Default is 0.

color

Specify the color of the padded area. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Color" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual.

The default value of color is "black".
